TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XPathMessageContext extends System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext

summary.span: 定义利用 SOAP 文档计算 XPath 表达式时经常要使用的多个 XPath 函数和命名空间映射。

span.span: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 引擎具有完全 XPath 上下文支持，并使用 .NET Framework 的 类，其方式与 实现此支持的方式相同。The XPath engine has full XPath context support and uses the .NET Framework's class in the same way that does to implement this support. 是一个抽象类，它允许开发人员实现自定义 XPath 函数库并声明 XPath 变量。 is an abstract class that allows developers to implement custom XPath function libraries and declare XPath variables. 是一个 ，因此也包含命名空间前缀映射。 is an and thus also contains the namespace prefix mappings. 筛选器引擎可以实现名称为 的 。The filter engine implements an named . 不但可以定义 Xpath 表达式中使用的自定义函数，还可声明多个常用的命名空间前缀映射。 defines custom functions that can be used in XPath expressions and it declares several common namespace prefix mappings. 下表列出了由定义的 可在 XPath 表达式中使用的自定义函数。The following table lists the custom functions defined by that can be used in XPath expressions. |XPath 函数XPath Function|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |bodybody|不管 SOAP 版本 (1.1，都将返回 SOAP Body 节点。Returns the SOAP Body node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1. 或 1.2) 。or 1.2).| |标头的值开始缓存响应header|无论 SOAP 版本 (1.1 还是 1.2) ，都将返回 SOAP 标头节点。Returns the SOAP Header node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |相关数据correlation-data|获取一个输入字符串，并返回关联的相关消息属性的值。Takes an input string and returns the value of the associated correlation message property. "wsc-instanceId" 是用于基于上下文的关联的保留字符串。'wsc-instanceId' is a reserved string used for context-based correlation.| |messageIdmessageId|返回 WS-ADDRESSING MessageID 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing MessageID header.| |relatesTorelatesTo|返回 WS-ADDRESSING RelatesTo 标头的值，无论版本 (August2004 还是 WSA 1.0) 。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing RelatesTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |replyToreplyTo|返回 WS-ADDRESSING ReplyTo 标头的值，无论版本 (August2004 还是 WSA 1.0) 。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |fromfrom|无论版本 (August2004 还是 WSA 1.0) ，都从标头返回 WS-ADDRESSING 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing From header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |faultTofaultTo|无论版本 (August2004 还是 WSA 1.0) ，都将返回 WS-ADDRESSING FaultTo 标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing FaultTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |设置为to|将 WS-ADDRESSING 的值返回到标头（如果存在），否则它将返回 Anonymous。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing To header if present, else it returns Anonymous.| |actionaction|返回 WS-ADDRESSING 操作标头的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing Action header.| |soap-urisoap-uri|返回 SOAP 命名空间 uri。Returns the SOAP namespace uri.| |带-主角的标头headers-with-actor|采用 SOAP 执行组件 uri 并返回包含该执行组件的所有标头，而不考虑 SOAP 版本 (1.1 或 1.2) 。Takes a SOAP Actor uri and returns all headers that contain that actor, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |actoractor|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP 执行组件 uri，而不考虑 SOAP 版本 (1.1 或 1.2) 。Returns the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |是-必需的is-mandatory|如果第一个子节点是必需的，则返回，无论 SOAP 版本 (1.1 还是 1.2) 。Returns whether or not the first child node is mandatory, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |是-主角-nextis-actor-next|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP 执行组件 uri 是否假设下一个角色，无论 SOAP 版本 (1.1 还是 1.2) 。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the Next role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-主角-旗舰版-接收器is-actor-ultimate-receiver|返回第一个子节点的 SOAP 执行组件 uri 是否假设 UltimateReceiver 角色，无论 SOAP 版本 (1.1 还是 1.2) 。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the UltimateReceiver role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |日期时间date-time|采用输入日期字符串并返回转换为 double 的值。Takes an input date string and returns the value converted to a double.| |durationduration|采用输入 timespan 字符串，并将值作为总天数返回。Takes an input timespan string and returns the value as a total number of days.| |utc-现在utc-now|返回的值 。Returns the value of .| 下表列出了由声明的默认命名空间和命名空间前缀 。The following table lists the default namespaces and namespace prefixes that are declared by . |前缀Prefix|命名空间Namespace| |------------|---------------| |s11s11|`http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope`| |s12s12|`http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope`| |wsaAugust2004wsaAugust2004|`http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing`| |wsa10wsa10|`http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing`| |smsm|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/serviceModel/2004/05/xpathfunctions`| |tempuritempuri|`http://tempuri.org`| |serser|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization`|

param.span: 内部用于存储字符串的 类。

span.span: A class used internally to store strings.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包括此类、 和 在内的多个类在内部使用 类来存储属性和元素名称。Several classes including this one, , and use the class internally to store attribute and element names. 当 XML 文档中多次出现某个元素名或属性名时，该名称在 中只存储一次。When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the . 这些名称存储为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象类型。The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types. 这使您能够对这些字符串进行对象比较，而不是开销更大的字符串比较。This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.

param.name: baseUri
param.span: 要比较的第一个文档的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the first document to compare.

param.name: nextBaseUri
param.span: 要比较的第二个文档的基 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the second document to compare.

summary.span: 根据 XSLT 处理器加载文档的顺序对两个文档的基统一资源标识符 (URI) 进行比较。

span.span: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor.
Always returns 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应在派生的类中重写，然后才可以使用。This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.
